Text:
please stop re uploading files that are already added a million times..

are you doing simply so can have your name attached to the release ?

Also and more importantly i see you are not giving the groups the proper credit for their releases.
Believe it or not a lot of people want to know what they are getting and where it came from..

fuck the stupidity of TPB members never cease to amaze me !

Maybe i'll start doing the same damn thing.
I have a great idea i'll re-upload everything popular that was added the day before but I'll pretend *imply they came from me and delete any group names and add my own and then i'll keep doing that EVERY SINGLE DAY FOREVER !

Is that what TPB users want ?
Gimme a fucking break lol

@xpmule


Whats your problem dude?You see all my uploads?All my uploads are clean and working 100% without virus like other members.So show some respect.The Tb users need uploades like me that upload clean working without virus uploads.So all that you write is wrong.

Seriously... you could atleast put a link to the MDL Thread...
http://forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/24901-Windows-Loader-Current-release-information

I agree with xpmule and shhnedo.

Piratecopy is OK, but also stealing the credit is just unfair.
AVG picked this up as a trojan
thanks, yeah it's the same version published on mydigitallife forum
Anyone working on adding Windows 8 to this loader?  OR know anyone who has already?

BEWARE, I tried this and within 2 days an attempted sign in to my gmail accounts originated from Pakistan. I did a scan from a website that scans files for nasty stuff and this calls home to Pakistan. Do the research and you'll see what I mean. I had to change all my passwords for my email accounts. I'm glad I didn't do any online banking, I'd be in deep trouble. I bought the real Windows 7 and know I'm safe from these low life hackers!
